Reviews.Title: Good Quality for the money
Reviews.Author: granthas "granthas"
Reviews.Content: The TV has a very good picture, but the sound is lacking.  Audio appears to sound like it is coming out of a tube.  I had to buy an sound bar to get decent quality.  Other than that, we are very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised!
Reviews.Author: PAULACLF
Reviews.Content: I went to Walmart to see this product in person. I was going to buy it from Walmart but saw that Amazon offered it at a lower price and with free delivery. I was a little worried buying such a big ticket item online and was not sure if it would be delivered to my house in one piece. I was plesantly surprised to have no problems with this item. It is working wonderfully and couldn't be happier with the quality and the price!!

Reviews.Title: Meets above what I thought I was getting
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: This tv provides quality that even some high brands dont provide. This was unexspected but a relief. Picture is bright clear and crisp. The only down fall is how bland the speakers are. Very little bass but i have surround sound when i watch a movie. The biggest surprise is that i thought i was getting a 60hrz however i ended up with a 120hrz. I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, Great price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV now for about 6 months.  So far, I am extremely happy with my purchase.  I had a 27" Sony Bravia prior to this as my main tv, so for me 47" is a HUGE upgrade.  The picture is just as good as the Sony, and the sound is pretty good as well.  To be fair, I have it hooked up to a home theater system, so I can't really judge the tv only sound fairly.  This is not a top of the line tv.  It's not 3D, it's not the biggest screen on the market, and it doesn't have all the internet gadgets.  But I have an external streaming media device already, so I didn't want to pay the extra $$$ for that feature.  Even if I didn't already have one, you can buy one new for less than $100 making that an opportunity to save $$$ instead of paying the premium for the internal internet controls on some tv models.  3D is fairly new, and I'm not sure yet it's here to stay, or if it's a fad.  If it is here to stay, it will get better in coming years so I don't personally think it's worth buying now unless you have money to burn.  But, one thing I am fairly certain of, if it is here to stay, the pricepoint of this feature is sure to come down in coming years, making it more affordable in a few years or so.  For me, the higher end tv's were not worth the at least twice as much, and in a lot of cases three times what I paid for this perfectly competent and good tv.

Reviews.Title: Flat screen tv
Reviews.Author: K. Preast
Reviews.Content: I love this flat screen tv...very easy to set up, beautiful picture and great price!!! And the price was well within my budget. Another plus it was made in the USA!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Vizio E470VLE 47 In. 1080 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Maurice
Reviews.Content: TV picture VG , need to improve sound system with better or more speakers , have tried all sound setting nothing help sound quaility .

Reviews.Title: Great TV For The Money
Reviews.Author: thejmjohnson
Reviews.Content: This TV looks great mounted on my wall using the Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flat Screen TV Wall Mount Bracket for 32-65-Inch Plasma LED LCD TV. The picture is crisp and clean. Yes its a lcd and not a led, but i think its great. Like most others i have found the sound to be the weak point. Not that its horrible its just not the best out here but it will do for the average user. You will enjoy this TV!

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: get bob
Reviews.Content: Have this set for one year now,  works perfectly.I can view the screen from very sharp angles with no loss of definition or color.This is the second Vizio I have and they don't disappoint!It was at a good price and delivery was fast.If you're looking for a brand I would say check them out for quality and price!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding!
Reviews.Author: F20lkmtaco
Reviews.Content: Got this TV and the picture quality is outstanding!  The sound quality is good but it's not that important to me.  I'm very happy with this product!

Reviews.Title: something missing
Reviews.Author: dewie lovett
Reviews.Content: The set is great, easy set up and good sound.  The deal was the problem.  It came in a box that had been repacked, the warranty card had been filled out almost a year ago and the power cord would work somewhere other than in the United states.  I salvaged a cord from a printer and hooked it up.  I will probably not make large purchases from Amazon in the future.  Their third party suppliers are typical internet businesses who link to reputable web sites and deliver rebuilt and represent the stuff as new and have almost no way of communicating any issues.  I should get an adjustment for not sending the set back.  Buy local, buy new.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J.
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Vizio (sold the other 2) and I can't complain. Ive had it running as a primary Tv for my family for over 2 years now and couldn't be happier. The blacks could be darker but overall the picture is great. I've run through a Sony Bravia (great) and two LGs (terrible) and find that this TV is more than comparable. There is no shadowing or ghosting visible on the screen. I can't comment on the audio, as I purchased a sound system to compliment the tv. I wouldn't really expect built-in speakers on an LCD impress anyone...

Reviews.Title: VERY PROUD MAN
Reviews.Author: DETERMINED
Reviews.Content: This T.V. is amazing!!! VERY CLEAR!!! Not hard to navigate and easy to setup!!! The price wasnt bad as well. Im very satisfied>

Reviews.Title: first one failed just over 12 months of use, so I bought this to t'shoot the old one. works good.
Reviews.Author: michael dagley
Reviews.Content: see above. first one failed, so i bought this to t'shoot the old one. It is worth the money. so i'm happy.

Reviews.Title: 47" Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: wllmharvey
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from Amazon and I'm happy with it. Picture is great but the sound is not the best. I bought the Vizio sound bar and a smart Blueray player to go with it. With the sound bar and smart Blueray player it turned out to be a great system.

Reviews.Title: great tv for a great buy
Reviews.Author: schalz
Reviews.Content: You will be very happy with the tv and the prompt delivery.... A definite must buy with a budget and still own a great HD tv.

Reviews.Title: Another great Vizio
Reviews.Author: Jahi
Reviews.Content: Bought this as an upgrade from my 5 year old plasma vizio (42"). Picture quality is great. I use it for gaming (PS3), movies, and as a secondary monitor. I see no shadowing or ghosting issues. The internal speakers are lacking as expected, but I have it hooked up to a 5.1 home theater anyways. This TV was a great deal, and I am really impressed with the screen quality.

Reviews.Title: A terrific buy!
Reviews.Author: John Richards "John"
Reviews.Content: I paid only $580 for this TV, free shipping, when I bought it during a special pre-Black Friday sale. So it was a tremendous bargain!  The picture quality is outstanding, the sound quality is only average, but I'm not an audiophile so it doesn't bother me. This TV replaced a plasma unit which suffered from room/window light reflections; no such problem with the LCD screen.

Reviews.Title: Just as promised
Reviews.Author: Crazy4Sting "Crazy4Sting"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this after returning another brand with a faulty screen/picture. Amazon picked it up within 24 hours with no hassles to us (except repacking it). We spent a few extra $$ over our budgeted amount for a TV but it was well worth it. The picture is fantastic and clear from over 15' away. It was easy to set up in our home and connect to our satellite, DVD, and Wii. However, we've not used the Wii yet with this set. I would definitely purchase again/recommend to a friend.5/09/13: The "mother board" went out two weeks ago and we have not been able to get the one person in a 20-mile radius to get out to the house to repair it. He estimates it will be around $200 to fix. I will not buy Toshiba again. This TV is on less than two hours a day, more on the weekends and holidays. Who knows how long it would have lasted if we used it more. This is the most expensive TV I have bought and the only one that I've had to have repaired.

Reviews.Title: CUSTOMER SATISFACATION
Reviews.Author: RAY JEDD
Reviews.Content: REVIEWED PROS AND CONS. ORDERED FROM MY SOFA-DELIVERED ON TIME.EASY SETUP AND MANUEL INSTRUCTIONS, NICE UNIT FOR THE PRICE. PICVG. SOUND 8 OUT OF 10 SCALE.

Reviews.Title: Good picture - terrible sound
Reviews.Author: Mondo Fuego
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is good ... not great.  But, the sound quality and volume is sadly lacking.  I contacted Vizio Customer Service and they weren't the least bit interested in doing anything about this inferior quality TV even though I am a good customer who has purchased 5 other Vizio TVs.  Even if the price is attractive, I do not recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Customer sevice
Reviews.Author: A Person from Earth
Reviews.Content: The Customer service is  not very friendly. We called to ask about the screws to connect the TV to the base which comes with it as they were missing. All we really wanted was to have the info on which screws to buy so that we could set it up. The customer service lady went immediately on defense mode as the television was purchased over a month before the time we called... We were not even asking for them to send them although it had been a month and the screws were still missing.... She was unfriendly and had an attitude...

Reviews.Title: Vizio 47 inch TV
Reviews.Author: skip2malew
Reviews.Content: This was a prize for our festival raffle for our church and school.  The box was very beat up, but I have talked to the winner and have been told it works great.
